column2: You can permanently change your Mateship Faction.
The time has come for you to choose your faction amongst the Commonwealth Citizens. Which one will you choose?
I shall join in Solidarity with my mates.
In the name of Fairness I shall join my mates.
I shall pledge Loyalty in the name of my mates.
The time has come for you to choose your faction amongst the Commonwealth Citizens. Which one will you choose?
I shall raise the blade to defend my mates.
I shall seek Freedom with my mates.
